titles.title: He Whom The Son Sets Free

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He whom the Son sets free is free indeed. Completely liberated from the curse of the law. He whom the Son sets free is free indeed, Free to be a servant of the Most High God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For where the spirit of the Lord is, There is liberty. I am not entangled With the yoke of slavery. Jesus is the truth That has come to set us free. I am free, I am free, I am free !!!!{/lang-eng}
